sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import TourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import "./toursdetails.css"; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const ToursDetails = () => { const id = useParams(); const tour = TourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); const { title, desc, price, address, city, maxGroupSize, avgRating, reviews, distance, } = tour; const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return (

{title}

{" "} {avgRating} {address}
{city} ${price} /per person ${distance} k/m {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews({reviews?.lenght}reviews)

{reviews?.map((reviews) => (
kathan

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing Tour
))}
); }; export default ToursDetails;
